title: British Egyptologist on quest to find Nefertiti's tomb
content: Cairo (AFP) - A British archaeologist who believes the legendary Queen Nefertiti may be buried in a secret room adjoining her son Tutankhamun's tomb is coming to Egypt to test his theory, authorities said Monday. Egyptologist Nicholas Reeves will arrive in the country at the end of the month, a statement said. To this day, Nefertiti's final r ......
